job_description:
• Highly motivated, proactive, with a strong work ethic, able to work independently and collaborate effectively with people from different culture backgrounds.
• Communicate with internal partners and a worldwide IT team to innovate solutions that fit customer needs and gives value to the business.
• Must be pursuing a bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field Apply the concepts and technology from college to real-world scenarios.
• Strong analytical, problem solving, and organizational skills Familiar with C、C++、C#、Database、PERL, Unix is preferable.
• Strong problem-solving skills with logical approach.
• Strong verbal and written communication skills Must not graduate before September 2026 Less than 2 years.
